column1: [MacMahon] Mavs had four players out due to health and safety protocols -- Jalen Brunson, Dorian Finney-Smith, Josh Richardson and Maxi Kleber -- and did not add any due to contact tracing after Kleber's positive test yesterday. That means at least five more Mavs entered protocols today.
[Charania] Mavericks’ players quarantined due to health and safety protocols: Josh Richardson, Dorian Finney-Smith, Jalen Brunson.

[MacMahon] The Mavs’ practice facility has been shut down after the team’s second positive test in three days, sources said. Maxi Kleber started self-isolation this morning. Jalen Brunson, Dorian Finney-Smith and Josh Richardson still quarantining in Denver. Contact tracing being done now.

[Townsend] Jalen Brunson, Dorian Finney-Smith and Josh Richardson are the Mavericks who are out due to COVID-19 "health and safety protocols." It's not clear which one of them tested positive for the virus
[Highlight] Dorian Finney-Smith skies out of nowhere for the putback jam
[Highlight] Luka's laser pass to Dorian Finney-Smith
[Charania] Mavericks’ players quarantined due to health and safety protocols: Josh Richardson, Dorian Finney-Smith, Jalen Brunson.
[Highlight] Dorian Finney-Smith with a nasty put-back slam
[Highlight] Dorian Finney-Smith drills a 3 to give the Mavericks a 20-point lead in the 4th quarter in Brooklyn
[Highlight Request] Dorian Finney Smith Postgame interview
[Caplan] Dorian Finney-Smith after his season-high 23 points (8 of 17 FG): "I knew I was going to get shots because I knew they was going to put Rudy on me."
[Callie Caplan] Dorian Finney-Smith after his season-high 23 points (8 of 17 FG): "I knew I was going to get shots because I knew they was going to put Rudy on me."

Can I get some advice on Fantasy? Who should I start between KJ Martin Jr, Dorian Finney-Smith, and Kendrick Nunn?
[Highlight] Dorian Finney-Smith runs into the cameraman
[Highlight] Dorian Finney-Smith with a rejection of his own!
[Highlight] Nerlens Noel puts Dorian Finney-Smith in his block list
[Highlight] Nerlens Noel puts Dorian Finney-Smith in his block list
[Highlight] Dorian Finney-Smith drills the dagger 3 to put the Warriors away!

[Tim MacMahon] “Mavs F Dorian Finney-Smith had one of the better all-around performances of his career in the win over the Nets -- 17 points (6-11 FG, 3-6 3s), 8 rebounds, 3 assists and was the primary defender on Kevin Durant (20 points, 7-21 FG). Mavs were +23 in his 39 minutes.”
How much would you give Dorian Finney Smith to play on your team?
[Townsend] Doncic has been downgraded to doubtful for tonight, as has Dorian Finney-Smith. Richardson, Redick, and PORZINGIS upgraded to probable.
In tonight’s loss against the Clippers, 6’7 Dorian Finney-Smith had more offensive rebounds (5) than 7’3 Kristaps Porzingis had total rebounds
In tonight’s loss against the Clippers, 6’7 Dorian Finney-Smith had more offensive rebounds (5) than 7’3 Kristaps Porzingis had total rebounds (3)
[Callie Caplan] Dorian Finney-Smith on Ivica Zubac guarding him much of Game 1: "I think either me or Maxi is going to be happy when he's guarding because we're going to get shots."

Players that averaged more rebounds than Kristaps Porzingis over 7 games: Luka Doncic, Dorian Finney-Smith, Paul George, Kawhi Leonard, Boban Marjonovic, Ivica Zubac, Nicolas Batum. He is 7 feet 3 inches tall.
[Highlight] Jaden McDaniels crosses Dorian-Finney Smith into St. Paul
Dorian Finney-Smith on Luka Doncic: "He had 46 and what -- 14 [assists]? What else can you ask for from him?"

Dorian Finney-Smith on Tim Hardaway Jr.'s shooting: "Right now, he's a flamethrower, so we're gonna keep trying to get him the ball just so he can shoot himself cold, if he ever goes cold. We like to say some people have a hot day, a hot week. Tim's having a hot decade."

[Mayo] The Washington Wizards have internally discussed a handful of names so far this off-season, I’m told: DeMar DeRozan, Dorian Finney-Smith, Dillon Brooks, and Justice Winslow. DeRozan is willing to accept between $20-23M ($27.7M earned last year). Mutual interest is present.

[Eddie Sefko] Jason Kidd divulges that at the moment, Dwight Powell would be the starter at center next to Kristaps Porzingis and Dorian Finney-Smith on the front line. Luka and THJ in the backcourt, of course. Kidd said this is subject to change, of course.
